description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a modal bottom sheet used to create or edit vehicle information in a fleet management app.

classes.name: VehicleEditorSheet
classes.description: A stateful widget that presents a form for creating or editing a vehicle.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget, returning an instance of _VehicleEditorSheetState.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Returns the widget's UI, a modal bottom sheet containing a form for vehicle data input.

methods.name: _saveVehicle
methods.description: Validates the form and either adds a new vehicle or updates an existing one via the VehiclesProvider.
